Topic.Title: i can´t upload my .squiffy game (i´m newbie)

Posts.EditableText: I can´t upload a game that I made on squiffy in the site textadventures.co.uk , I´ve searched everywhere and I couldn´t find any tutorial on the internet so if anybody made a step-by-step tutorial would be great and remeber, i am a totally newbie and I don´t know nothing about how to upload a .squiffy or how to compile it, please help me, you are my last resort!!!
Posts.HTML: I can´t upload a game that I made on squiffy in the site textadventures.co.uk , I´ve searched everywhere and I couldn´t find any tutorial on the internet so if anybody made a step-by-step tutorial would be great and remeber, i am a totally newbie and I don´t know nothing about how to upload a .squiffy or how to compile it, please help me, you are my last resort!!!

Posts.EditableText: Click the Build button in the top right of Squiffy. That will create the HTML and JavaScript files you need to upload - just zip these and then upload your zip file.
Posts.HTML: Click the Build button in the top right of Squiffy. That will create the HTML and JavaScript files you need to upload - just zip these and then upload your zip file.

Posts.EditableText: Thanks a lot!!! you saved me here
